It's like telling your life story to someone about how you were raped and molested as a child, your father had cancer and your mother was prostituting you to her friends and then when the person you're telling your story to is crying and heartbroken, you go "actually that was all a lie lol." :)) Bro wtf.

But thats kinda like a double edge sword "im gonna rewrite and make you forget everything in the past" if hes successful then all is good but after a while if he cant satisfy her completely he will lose her for sure cause she will remember those times with the past guy stronger. And lastly whats up with the "Today is the first time ANYONE has came inside me" Why does that "Anyone" make it sound like theres more than just one guy from the past she coulda easily said "actually i lied about one thing and thats that he never came inside me"
